Mr Thunbir Elahi the Computer Science teacher

I specialize in teaching computer science from the ages of 11-16

Learn about me

I Specialize In

My subject knowledge specialization would be in the following

Networks Operating System

A network operating system is a specialized operating system for a network device such as a router, switch or firewall

Programming

Programming is a creative task: there is no right or wrong way to solve a problem, in the same way that there is no right or wrong way to paint a picture.

Algorthimic Thinking

Algorithmic thinking is a way of getting to a solution through the clear definition of the steps needed – nothing happens by magic. Rather than coming up with a single answer to a problem

Ethical and Legal Issues

There are laws in place to govern the use of computers and the internet. However, legal issues are not always straightforward. Technology and the internet are evolving rapidly and this throws up new ethical and legal dilemmas.

My Teaching process.....

All of my teaching techniques are hand picked from various academic thought process.

1

Blooms Taxonomy

Developed in 1956 by Benjamin Bloom, Bloom’s Taxonomy is a hierarchical model of learning objectives. The model organizes individual educational tasks, such as comparing concepts and defining words

2

Scaffolding

Scaffolding, is the act of adjusting the level of support provided in order to best meet each child's abilities. For example, when teaching a new math concept, a teacher would first walk the student through each step to complete the task.

3

PRIMM

It is based on research into the learning of programming but combines different areas. Our overall interpretation of the research is that teaching programming requires a blended approach using a range of strategies.

4

Behaviorism

Behaviorism, a set of theories laid out by B.F. Skinner, suggests that all behavior is a response to an external stimulus. In the classroom, behaviorism is the theory that students' learning and behavior will improve in response to positive reinforcement like rewards, praise, and bonuses
